day1.start: Your phone's alarm is ringing. It's time to wake up. Today you start in a new school, it is time to meet your new classmates.
day1.startClass: Everyone sits down and the class starts.
day1.startClassLate: You go and sit in your place while everyone is looking at you.
day1.startBreak: The bell rings, it is recess time. Your opportunity to make friends.
